title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Energy
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Energy 

Performance of Buildings) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation of the 

Building Regulations 1997 to 2024. 

Definition
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (energy performance buildings) regulation 2024 (2) regulation shall included collective citation building regulation 1997 2024 definition

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect
heading: In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2021” means the European Union
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2021” means the European Union 

(Energy Performance of Buildings) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 393 of 2021). 

Amendment of Regulation 5 of Regulations of 2021

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect
heading: 3. Regulation 5(c) of the Regulations of 2021 is amended by the
text_raw:
3. Regulation 5(c) of the Regulations of 2021 is amended by the 

substitution of “31 December 2024” for “31 December 2025”. 

Insertion of Regulation 5A into Regulations of 2021
text_norm: 3 regulation 5(c) regulation 2021 amended substitution 31 december 2024 31 december 2025  insertion regulation 5a regulation 2021

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect
heading: 4. The Regulations of 2021 are amended by the insertion of the following
text_raw:
4. The Regulations of 2021 are amended by the insertion of the following 

Regulation after Regulation 5: 

“Meaning of building automation and control system 

5A For the purposes of Regulation 5(c), the reference to a building 

automation and control system means a system that is capable of— 

(a) 

continuously monitoring, logging, analysing and allowing for 
adjusting energy use, 

(b) benchmarking the building’s energy efficiency, detecting losses 
in efficiency of technical building systems, and informing the 
person responsible for the facilities or technical building 
management about opportunities 
for energy efficiency 
improvement, 

1 OJ No. L 2024/1275, 08.05.2024. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [642] 3 

(c) 

allowing communication with connected technical building 
systems and other appliances inside the building, and being 
interoperable with technical building systems across different 
types of proprietary technologies, devices and manufacturers, and 

(d) on and from 29 May 2026, monitoring of indoor environmental 

quality.”. 

Amendment of Regulation 9 of Regulations of 2021

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect
heading: 3. Regulation 9 of the Regulations of 2021 is amended by the substitution
text_raw:
3. Regulation 9 of the Regulations of 2021 is amended by the substitution 
of “(as if each reference to “this Act” in those sections read “this Act or the 
European Union (Energy Performance of Buildings) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
393 of 2021))”,” for “(as if each reference to “this Act” in those sections read 
“this Act or the European Union (Energy Performance of Buildings) Regulations 
2021),”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 November, 2024. 

DARRAH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [642]

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the requirements for building automation and control 
systems in buildings in accordance with Directive (EU) 2024/1275 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 24 April 2024 on the energy 
performance of buildings. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [642] 5
